home.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
home.subtitle: Quality-first developer with a unique QA leadership background

about.title: About Me
about.description: Self-taught Full-Stack Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience, including 5+ years in QA and project management leadership, and 3+ years in development. I specialize in modern web technologies with a unique quality-first development approach. I have a proven track record of building high-traffic applications serving 100K+ daily users and maintaining enterprise-grade SaaS platforms. I am a continuous learner with expertise gained through hands-on experience and structured online education.

stats.bugsDesc: Critical production bugs across major QA projects

lookIntoThierEyes.title: Look Into Their Eyes
lookIntoThierEyes.description: Is a bilingual (Hebrew/English) web exhibition showcasing the work of Israeli graffiti artist Benzi Brofman, with a focus on paintings created after the October 7th tragedy. The site serves as a memorial platform to raise awareness for the hostages taken during this event.

jaMoveo.title: JaMoveo
jaMoveo.description: Is a collaborative musical rehearsal application that enables musicians to practice together virtually. The application serves as a digital platform for musical groups where participants with different instruments can view the same songs simultaneously, with each user seeing customized content based on their instrument (vocalists see only lyrics, while instrumentalists see both chords and lyrics).

reportsManager.title: Reports Manager
reportsManager.description: A comprehensive reporting system for small businesses with modules for customer relationships, and financial reporting.

description.desc1: Designed and developed full-stack web applications using Next.js and modern React patterns.
description.desc2: Built and maintained enterprise desktop applications using WPF and .NET framework.
description.desc3: Implemented automated deployment workflows using GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines.
description.desc4: Drove project success through effective client communication and timely delivery.

description.desc1: Developed and maintained high-traffic web applications using Angular and React.
description.desc2: Led technical training sessions for 50+ developers on RxJS.
description.desc3: Created complex components used by 10+ teams, reducing development time.
description.desc4: Built scalable microservices using Node.js, NestJS, and Scala.

description.desc1: Built regression testing framework for embedded real-time systems.
description.desc2: Led QA for 3+ major platform projects with zero critical production bugs.
Established and maintained company-wide QA standards and processes.

description.desc1: Acted as a consultant for complex technical challenges, enhancing team problem-solving capabilities.

bezeq.title: Senior Technical Service Representative
bezeq.description: Built a strong technical foundation while solving complex customer issues. Developed troubleshooting skills and learned to communicate technical concepts clearly to non-technical audiences.

myThings.title: QA & PM Team Leader
myThings.description: Led a team of 5 QA specialists delivering 50+ projects annually. Established company-wide quality standards and processes. Learned project management, team leadership, and strategic planning.

nova.title: QA Manual Test Engineer
nova.description: Built comprehensive regression testing frameworks for embedded real-time systems. Led QA for 3+ major platform projects with zero critical production bugs. Developed deeper technical expertise.

outbrain.title: Software Engineer
outbrain.description: Made the transition to full-time development, building high-traffic web applications using Angular and React. Created complex components used by 10+ teams. Led technical training sessions for 50+ developers.

freelance.title: Freelance Software Engineer
freelance.description: Designing and developing full-stack web applications using Next.js and modern React patterns. Building enterprise desktop applications with .NET. Implementing automated deployment workflows with CI/CD.

keyLearning.title: My Quality-First Approach
keyLearning.description: My journey from QA to development has shaped my unique perspective on software engineering. I approach every project with quality as the primary focus, combining rigorous testing methodologies with modern development practices to create robust, maintainable software that exceeds both technical requirements and user expectations.
